hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command: mkdir mosync-trunk set PATH=%MSYS_BIN%;%PATH% tar --directory=mosync-trunk -xjf MoSyncSrc.tar.bz2 exit 0

set MOSYNCDIR=%WORKSPACE%\MoSyncPackage call "%VS100COMNTOOLS%vsvars32.bat" mkdir MoSyncPackage cd MoSyncPackage mkdir bin mkdir etc mkdir include mkdir lib cd lib mkdir w32
cd %WORKSPACE% set INCLUDE=%WORKSPACE%\mosync-trunk\tools\ReleasePackageBuild\build_package_tools\include;%WORKSPACE%\mosync-trunk\tools\ReleasePackageBuild\build_package_tools\include\msvc;%WORKSPACE%\mosync-trunk\tools\ReleasePackageBuild\build_package_tools\lib;%INCLUDE% set LIB=%WORKSPACE%\mosync-trunk\tools\ReleasePackageBuild\build_package_tools\lib;%LIB% set LIBPATH=%WORKSPACE%\mosync-trunk\tools\ReleasePackageBuild\build_package_tools\lib;%LIBPATH%
Xcopy %WORKSPACE%\mosync-trunk\MoSyncRules.props %WORKSPACE%\MoSyncPackage\ cd %WORKSPACE%\mosync-trunk\intlibs\bluetooth rename config_bluetooth.h.example config_bluetooth.h cd %WORKSPACE%\mosync-trunk\runtimes\cpp\platforms\sdl rename config_platform.h.example config_platform.h
cd %WORKSPACE%\mosync-trunk ruby workfile.rb base if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel%
cd %WORKSPACE%\mosync-trunk\libs\MAStd msbuild /p:Configuration=Release if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel% cd %WORKSPACE%\mosync-trunk\libs\MAUtil msbuild /p:Configuration=Release if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel% cd %WORKSPACE%\mosync-trunk\libs\MAUI msbuild /p:Configuration=Release if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel% cd %WORKSPACE%\mosync-trunk\libs\MTXml msbuild /p:Configuration=Release if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel% cd %WORKSPACE%\mosync-trunk\libs\MAFS msbuild /p:Configuration=Release if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel% cd %WORKSPACE%\mosync-trunk\intlibs\bluetooth msbuild /p:Configuration=Release if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel% cd %WORKSPACE%\mosync-trunk\intlibs\net msbuild /p:Configuration=Release if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel% cd %WORKSPACE%\mosync-trunk\intlibs\demangle msbuild /p:Configuration=Release if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel% cd %WORKSPACE%\mosync-trunk\intlibs\dgles-0.5 msbuild /p:Configuration=Release if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel% cd %WORKSPACE%\mosync-trunk\intlibs\filelist msbuild /p:Configuration=Release cd %WORKSPACE%\mosync-trunk\intlibs\gsm_amr msbuild /p:Configuration=Release if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel% cd %WORKSPACE%\mosync-trunk\intlibs\helpers\platforms\windows msbuild /p:Configuration=Release if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel% cd %WORKSPACE%\mosync-trunk\intlibs\dll msbuild /p:Configuration=Release if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel% cd %WORKSPACE%\mosync-trunk\intlibs\sqlite msbuild /p:Configuration=Release if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel% cd %WORKSPACE%\mosync-trunk\runtimes\cpp\platforms\sdl msbuild /p:Configuration=Release if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel% cd %WORKSPACE%\mosync-trunk\runtimes\cpp\platforms\sdl\mosynclib msbuild /p:Configuration=Release if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel% cd %WORKSPACE%\mosync-trunk\runtimes\cpp\platforms\sdl\MoRE msbuild /p:Configuration=Release if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel%
Xcopy "%VCINSTALLDIR%redist\x86\Microsoft.VC100.CRT\msvcp100.dll" %WORKSPACE%\MoSyncPackage\bin\ Xcopy "%VCINSTALLDIR%redist\x86\Microsoft.VC100.CRT\msvcr100.dll" %WORKSPACE%\MoSyncPackage\bin\
cd %WORKSPACE%\MoSyncPackage\lib rename w32 vs2010
